basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. James Caster Scholarship in Legal Studies

description: This scholarship, established by alumnus Ben Odom, is named in honor of Dr. James Caster and is intended to aid a Political Science major attend law school. Eligibility Requirements Political Science major Full-time student Minimum 2.5 GPA overall Continuing student for fall semester that the scholarship is awarded Please provide a two page essay describing need and intent to pursue a law degree

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
